entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 19.
